title: Bank of Mexico Maintains Crypto Caution Despite Global Shift
description: Mexico’s central bank said it will maintain a “healthy distance” between digital assets and the country’s traditional financial system.
content: Mexico’s central bank said it will maintain a “healthy distance” between digital assets and the country’s traditional financial system.
